hero.title: Advantages of Funsim
hero.subtitle: Share wireless mobile internet via eSIM with other devices easily and instantly
hero.card2_text: Personal, work, and travel plans — all in one smartphone. Switch in a couple of taps
hero.card3_text: No more chatting with bots or AI. Trust professionals — our team solves any connection issue instantly!
hero.card4_text: eSIM can’t be lost or damaged. If you lose your phone, easily transfer the number to another device
hero.card5_text: Large data packages at affordable prices. No hidden fees, overcharges, or forced services
hero.card6_text: No plastic SIM cards — less waste and care for the planet
